name: Confetti White Puppy Chow
author: karen
summary: This is a variation of a cake batter puppy chow mix. I like to bring this to gatherings because it is too addictive to keep at home! I like to use Crispix® for the shape, but you can use rice or corn Chex®. Store this in a sealed zipper bag or plastic container.
ingredients: 5 ounces vanilla-flavored candy coating (almond bark), chopped
5 cups crispy corn and rice cereal (such as Crispix®)
1 ½ cups white cake mix with colored sprinkles
2 tablespoons colored sprinkles, or more to taste
directions: Combine vanilla almond bark and shortening in a microwave-safe bowl
Melt in microwave stirring every 30 seconds until mixture is smooth, about 90 seconds total
Place corn and rice cereal in a large bowl
Slowly pour the almond bark mixture over the cereal, stirring often to completely coat
Add cake mix and confectioners' sugar to cereal mixture; toss to coat
Shake sprinkles over the puppy chow
